docs.snippet: Australia's football chief Frank Lowy has warned FIFA not to rush a decision on switching the 2022 World Cup in Qatar to the northern hemisphere winter and said other bidders should be compensated if the move goes ahead....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's football chief Frank Lowy has warned FIFA not to rush a decision on switching the 2022 World Cup in Qatar to the northern hemisphere winter and said other bidders should be compensated if the move goes ahead.

headline.main: Australia Wants Compensation for Qatar World Cup Switch
headline.print_headline: Australia Wants Compensation for Qatar World Cup Switch

docs.snippet: Alex Smith is still winning in red. He's just doing it for the Chiefs these days....

headline.main: New Faces, New Places Marks Start of NFL Season
headline.print_headline: New Faces, New Places Marks Start of NFL Season

docs.snippet: UEFA president Michel Platini has said that he will make a decision on whether to run for FIFA presidency next year at the earliest....
docs.lead_paragraph: UEFA president Michel Platini has said that he will make a decision on whether to run for FIFA presidency next year at the earliest.

headline.main: Platini to Decide on FIFA Top Job 'During or After World Cup'
headline.print_headline: Platini to Decide on FIFA Top Job 'During or After World Cup'

docs.snippet: The family of Jonathan Ferrell, who while searching for help after an accident was shot to death by a Charlotte, N.C., officer, applauded the city for charging the officer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The family of Jonathan Ferrell, who while searching for help after an accident was shot to death by a Charlotte, N.C., officer, applauded the city for charging the officer.
docs.abstract: Former college football player Jonathan Ferrell is shot to death by Charlotte, NC, Police Officer Randall Kerrick while searching for help after a car accident; Kerrick will face arraignment on voluntary manslaughter charges.

headline.main: Asking for Help, Then Killed by an Officer’s Barrage
headline.print_headline: Asking for Help, Then Killed by an Officer’s Barrage

byline.contributor: Christine Jordan Sexton contributed reporting from Tallahassee, Fla., and John Peragine from Charlotte.

docs.snippet: Real Madrid goalkeeper Iker Casillas was forced off in the 15th minute of Tuesday's 6-1 Champions League Group B romp at Galatasaray after sustaining a rib injury in a collision with team mate Sergio Ramos....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid goalkeeper Iker Casillas was forced off in the 15th minute of Tuesday's 6-1 Champions League Group B romp at Galatasaray after sustaining a rib injury in a collision with team mate Sergio Ramos.

docs.snippet: Wayne Rooney scored twice against Bayer Leverkusen on Tuesday to reach 200 Manchester United goals as he enjoys a new lease of life under David Moyes who thinks he can become one of the club's greatest predators....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney scored twice against Bayer Leverkusen on Tuesday to reach 200 Manchester United goals as he enjoys a new lease of life under David Moyes who thinks he can become one of the club's greatest predators.

headline.main: Rooney Can Achieve More After 200 Goals-Moyes
headline.print_headline: Rooney Can Achieve More After 200 Goals-Moyes

docs.snippet: The University of Alabama is ordering changes in its sorority system amid charges of discrimination in the Greek-letter organizations, which the president acknowledged Tuesday are segregated by race....
docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Alabama is ordering changes in its sorority system amid charges of discrimination in the Greek-letter organizations, which the president acknowledged Tuesday are segregated by race.

headline.main: UA President: Sorority Decisions Based on Race
headline.print_headline: UA President: Sorority Decisions Based on Race

docs.snippet: Hatem Ben Arfa, left out of the France team since Euro 2012 after clashes with former coach Laurent Blanc and current coach Didier Deschamps, said he regrets his behaviour and wants to feature for Les Bleus again....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hatem Ben Arfa, left out of the France team since Euro 2012 after clashes with former coach Laurent Blanc and current coach Didier Deschamps, said he regrets his behaviour and wants to feature for Les Bleus again.

headline.main: Apologetic Ben Arfa Regrets Clashing With Blanc, Deschamps
headline.print_headline: Apologetic Ben Arfa Regrets Clashing With Blanc, Deschamps

docs.snippet: Holders Bayern Munich made a sparkling start to their Champions League title defence on Tuesday as Pep Guardiola's side eased past CSKA Moscow 3-0 in their Group D opener at the Allianz Arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: Holders Bayern Munich made a sparkling start to their Champions League title defence on Tuesday as Pep Guardiola's side eased past CSKA Moscow 3-0 in their Group D opener at the Allianz Arena.

headline.main: Guardiola Proud of Bayern After Holders Crush CSKA
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Proud of Bayern After Holders Crush CSKA

docs.snippet: Lawyers for a North Carolina police officer say he was "justified" in shooting an unarmed man 10 times, killing him shortly after police say he survived a car accident early Saturday morning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawyers for a North Carolina police officer say he was "justified" in shooting an unarmed man 10 times, killing him shortly after police say he survived a car accident early Saturday morning.

headline.main: North Carolina Cop 'Justified' in Shooting Unarmed Man, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Cop 'Justified' in Shooting Unarmed Man, Lawyers Say
